name: MSCRMGetLatestPatch
description: Retrieves the latest patch for a given solution from a PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 environment
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: crmConnectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: For more information on format check the [docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect)

inputs.name: solutionName
inputs.label: Solution Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique name of the solution you want to get the patch for

inputs.name: existsVariableName
inputs.label: Exists Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable to be populated with true if patch exists

inputs.name: patchVariableName
inputs.label: Patch Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable to be populated with patch name

OutputVariables.name: PATCH_EXISTS
OutputVariables.description: Returns true if the solution exists
